Uses of Package
uno.anahata.asi.chat

Packages that use uno.anahata.asi.chat
Package
Description
uno.anahata.asi
The core package of the Anahata AI framework, containing the central orchestrator and configuration classes.
uno.anahata.asi.chat
Provides model-agnostic, intelligent configuration objects for chat sessions.
uno.anahata.asi.cli
 
uno.anahata.asi.context
Manages the conversation history and the injection of just-in-time context.
uno.anahata.asi.context.provider
Defines the contract for providers that inject just-in-time context into an AI request.
uno.anahata.asi.gemini
Provides the concrete implementation of the anahata-ai core framework for the Google Gemini API.
uno.anahata.asi.model.core
Provides the core, model-agnostic domain model for all conversational AI interactions.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.java
Provides the concrete domain model for tools implemented as Java methods via reflection.
uno.anahata.asi.standalone.swing
 
uno.anahata.asi.status
Provides classes for managing and broadcasting chat status events.
uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat
 
uno.anahata.asi.tool
Provides the core framework for defining, managing, and executing local Java tools.
uno.anahata.asi.toolkit
